meanings.definition: A person who excels in sports and physical activities beyond the average level.
meanings.sent1: The superathletes in our school always win the races.
meanings.sent2: The superathletes trained hard to achieve their success.
meanings.sent3: The superathletes made the other students laugh with their incredible speed.
meanings.sent4: Watching the superathletes compete was like witnessing magic on the field.
meanings.sent5: The superathletes stood out with their extraordinary skills.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who possess exceptional athletic abilities.
meanings.sent1: We cheered for the superathletes during the championship.
meanings.sent2: The superathletes inspired others with their dedication to sports.
meanings.sent3: The superathletes organized a fun sports event for the community.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, the superathletes are like superheroes.
meanings.sent5: The superathletes amazed everyone with their incredible strength.
